description: Manage Azure DevOps projects, work items, repos, pipelines, wikis, search, and test plans from your coding workflow. Create and update work items, branches, pull requests, and wiki pages; run pipelines; and fetch build statuses, logs, and results on demand. Select only the capabilities you need to keep your workspace focused and fast.

pat.description: Azure DevOps Personal Access Token (required for authentication)

capabilities.name: core_list_project_teams
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of teams for the specified Azure DevOps project.

capabilities.name: core_list_projects
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of projects in your Azure DevOps organization.

capabilities.name: core_get_identity_ids
capabilities.description: Retrieve Azure DevOps identity IDs for a provided search filter.

capabilities.name: work_list_team_iterations
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of iterations for a specific team in a project.

capabilities.name: work_create_iterations
capabilities.description: Create new iterations in a specified Azure DevOps project.

capabilities.name: work_assign_iterations
capabilities.description: Assign existing iterations to a specific team in a project.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_definitions
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of build definitions for a given project.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_definition_revisions
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of revisions for a specific build definition.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_builds
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of builds for a given project.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_log
capabilities.description: Retrieves the logs for a specific build.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_log_by_id
capabilities.description: Get a specific build log by log ID.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_changes
capabilities.description: Get the changes associated with a specific build.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_run
capabilities.description: Gets a run for a particular pipeline.

capabilities.name: pipelines_list_runs
capabilities.description: Gets top 10000 runs for a particular pipeline.

capabilities.name: pipelines_run_pipeline
capabilities.description: Starts a new run of a pipeline.

capabilities.name: pipelines_get_build_status
capabilities.description: Fetches the status of a specific build.

capabilities.name: pipelines_update_build_stage
capabilities.description: Updates the stage of a specific build.

capabilities.name: repo_create_pull_request
capabilities.description: Create a new pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_create_branch
capabilities.description: Create a new branch in the repository.

capabilities.name: repo_update_pull_request
capabilities.description: Update a Pull Request by ID with specified fields, including setting autocomplete with various completion options.

capabilities.name: repo_update_pull_request_reviewers
capabilities.description: Add or remove reviewers for an existing pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_list_repos_by_project
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of repositories for a given project

capabilities.name: repo_list_pull_requests_by_repo_or_project
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of pull requests for a given repository. Either repositoryId or project must be provided.

capabilities.name: repo_list_pull_request_threads
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of comment threads for a pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_list_pull_request_thread_comments
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of comments in a pull request thread.

capabilities.name: repo_list_branches_by_repo
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of branches for a given repository.

capabilities.name: repo_list_my_branches_by_repo
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of my branches for a given repository Id.

capabilities.name: repo_get_repo_by_name_or_id
capabilities.description: Get the repository by project and repository name or ID.

capabilities.name: repo_get_branch_by_name
capabilities.description: Get a branch by its name.

capabilities.name: repo_get_pull_request_by_id
capabilities.description: Get a pull request by its ID.

capabilities.name: repo_reply_to_comment
capabilities.description: Replies to a specific comment on a pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_create_pull_request_thread
capabilities.description: Creates a new comment thread on a pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_resolve_comment
capabilities.description: Resolves a specific comment thread on a pull request.

capabilities.name: repo_search_commits
capabilities.description: Searches for commits in a repository

capabilities.name: repo_list_pull_requests_by_commits
capabilities.description: Lists pull requests by commit IDs to find which pull requests contain specific commits

capabilities.name: wit_list_backlogs
capabilities.description: Revieve a list of backlogs for a given project and team.

capabilities.name: wit_list_backlog_work_items

capabilities.name: wit_my_work_items
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of work items relevent to the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: wit_get_work_items_batch_by_ids
capabilities.description: Retrieve list of work items by IDs in batch.

capabilities.name: wit_get_work_item
capabilities.description: Get a single work item by ID.

capabilities.name: wit_list_work_item_comments
capabilities.description: Retrieve list of comments for a work item by ID.

capabilities.name: wit_add_work_item_comment
capabilities.description: Add comment to a work item by ID.

capabilities.name: wit_add_child_work_items
capabilities.description: Create one or many child work items from a parent by work item type and parent id.

capabilities.name: wit_link_work_item_to_pull_request

capabilities.name: wit_get_work_items_for_iteration
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of work items for a specified iteration.

capabilities.name: wit_update_work_item
capabilities.description: Update a work item by ID with specified fields.

capabilities.name: wit_get_work_item_type
capabilities.description: Get a specific work item type.

capabilities.name: wit_create_work_item

capabilities.name: wit_get_query
capabilities.description: Get a query by its ID or path.

capabilities.name: wit_get_query_results_by_id
capabilities.description: Retrieve the results of a work item query given the query ID.

capabilities.name: wit_update_work_items_batch
capabilities.description: Update work items in batch

capabilities.name: wit_work_items_link
capabilities.description: Link work items together in batch.

capabilities.name: wit_work_item_unlink
capabilities.description: Remove one or many links from a single work item

capabilities.name: wit_add_artifact_link
capabilities.description: Add artifact links (repository, branch, commit, builds) to work items. You can either provide the full vstfs URI or the individual components to build it automatically.

capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of wikis for an organization or project.

capabilities.name: wiki_list_pages
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of wiki pages for a specific wiki and project.

capabilities.name: wiki_get_page
capabilities.description: Retrieve wiki page metadata by path. This tool does not return page content.

capabilities.name: wiki_create_or_update_page

capabilities.description: Retrieve a paginated list of test plans from an Azure DevOps project. Allows filtering for active plans and toggling detailed information.

capabilities.name: testplan_create_test_plan

capabilities.description: Retrieve Advanced Security alerts for a repository.

capabilities.name: advsec_get_alert_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific Advanced Security alert.
